column4: does anyone know when this bug (https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/linux-source-2.6.22/+bug/153195) is going to be fixed? it's really annoying to have the computer using almost 30% cpu all the time. i thought hardy 8.04 beta would fix that, but it didn't... argh..
Please ask in #Ubuntu+1  the Hardy Room
jackster: i did but no one answered
i did but no one answered
